channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- AR1200, AR1200-S, AR150, AR160, AR200, AR2200, AR2200-S, AR3200, SRG1300, SRG2300, SRG3300
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- AR1200, AR1200-S, AR150, AR160, AR200, AR2200, AR2200-S, AR3200, SRG1300, SRG2300, SRG3300

item.title: CVE-2019-5300|2024-08-04T19:54:52.437Z -- huawei -- ar1200%2C%20ar1200-s%2C%20ar150%2C%20ar160%2C%20ar200%2C%20ar2200%2C%20ar2200-s%2C%20ar3200%2C%20srg1300%2C%20srg2300%2C%20srg3300
item.description: There is a digital signature verification bypass vulnerability in AR1200, AR1200-S, AR150, AR160, AR200, AR2200, AR2200-S, AR3200, SRG1300, SRG2300 and SRG3300 Huawei routers. The vulnerability is due to the affected software improperly verifying digital signatures for the software image in the affected device. A local attacker with high privilege may exploit the vulnerability to bypass integrity checks for software images and install a malicious software image on the affected device.
